translation.en: [woman] It's getting closer, but it's not getting any nicer.
translation.fr: C'est pas loin, mais c'est toujours aussi moche.

translation.en: [woman] It did not look like this on the internet.
translation.fr: Ça ne ressemblait pas à ça sur Internet.

translation.en: Yeah, I don't remember it being this sausage color.
translation.fr: Oui, cette couleur ne me dit rien.

translation.en: [young man] Okay, that's the last box, Mum.
Thanks, Jack. I'm gonna take a look at the new shop.
translation.fr: Merci, Jack. Je vais voir le nouveau magasin.

translation.en: How about you ride down, and I'll see you there?
translation.fr: Va faire un tour, on se retrouvera.
En fait, tu as une invitation.

translation.en: [Jack's mum] Her mum heard we moved into town.
translation.fr: Sa mère a appris qu'on déménageait en ville.

translation.en: [Jack chuckles] Go-karts are for kids, Mum.
translation.fr: Sa mère a appris qu'on déménageait en ville. Le kart c'est pour les gosses, maman.

translation.en: I prefer you driving one of those than pulling cupcakes in my car.
translation.fr: Je préfère ça plutôt que tu fasses des cupcakes dans ma voiture.

translation.en: -They're called donuts, thank you. -I know what they're called.
translation.fr: - On dit des donuts, merci. - Je sais.

translation.en: -Stop doing them. -I won't even know anyone.
translation.fr: - Arrête de faire ça. - Je ne connaîtrai personne.

translation.en: That's the point. You'll go to school with these kids once the holidays are over.
translation.fr: C'est l'idée. Tu seras en cours avec eux après les vacances.

translation.en: You either go to the party, or you can stay here and help me all afternoon.
translation.fr: Soit tu vas à la fête, soit tu restes ici et tu m'aides tout l'après-midi.

translation.en: You know, because a platypus lays eggs and produces milk,
translation.fr: Comme un ornithorynque pond des œufs et fait du lait,

translation.en: it's the only animal that can make its own custard.
translation.fr: c'est le seul animal qui peut faire de la crème.

translation.en: Wait. Are you laughing with me or at me?
translation.fr: Attends. Tu ris avec moi ou de moi ?

translation.en: Jack. Jack Hooper. Nice to meet you.
I'm a bit nervous about driving one of these things.
translation.fr: J'ai un peu peur de conduire un de ces trucs.

translation.en: -I've never done it before. -Neither have I.
translation.fr: - J'ai jamais fait ça. - Moi non plus.

translation.en: But I'm sure it'll be all right.
Come on. Hey, it'll be an adventure.
[Colin] State kart champion. Everyone thinks he'll win Nationals this year.
translation.fr: Champion régional de kart. On pense qu'il va gagner en national.

translation.en: Remember when I asked you if you were laughing with me or at me?
translation.fr: Tu te souviens ce que je t'ai demandé quand tu riais ?

translation.en: It was, like, one minute ago.
[Colin] Yeah, well, he and his mates laugh at me.
translation.fr: Lui et ses amis rient de moi.

translation.en: but I prefer to just ignore them and get on with my day.
translation.fr: mais je préfère les ignorer et continuer ma journée.

translation.en: Thanks for holding the party here. I appreciate the business.
translation.fr: Merci de faire la fête ici. J'apprécie l'attention.

translation.en: Have you thought anymore about coaching my boy?
translation.fr: Tu as réfléchi à entraîner mon fils ?

translation.en: Dean has a real shot at Nationals this year.
translation.fr: Dean a sa chance en national.

translation.en: All he needs someone with experience to help him get ready.
translation.fr: Il lui faut un formateur expérimenté.

translation.en: And you'd make a great asset to our team, Patrick.
translation.fr: Tu serais un atout pour notre équipe, Patrick.
Eh bien, comme je l'ai dit...

translation.en: Because your boy doesn't have enough talent and...
translation.fr: Parce que ton fils n'a pas assez de talent et...

translation.en: How long have you been karting?
translation.fr: Tu fais du karting depuis quand ?

translation.en: I don't know. I mean, I slid off.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas. J'ai dérapé.

translation.en: That's because you went on the outside of the track.
translation.fr: Car tu étais à l'extérieur du circuit.

translation.en: There were marbles on the track?
All the loose bits of dirt and rubber from the tires are swept onto the outside,
translation.fr: Tous les morceaux de pneus et de terre sont balayés vers l'extérieur,

translation.en: and when you drive over them, they're super slippery.
translation.fr: et quand on roule dessus, c'est super glissant.

translation.en: Yeah, but I prefer to make 'em go faster.
translation.fr: Oui, mais je préfère les améliorer.

translation.en: Well, they're actually called chief engineers, but yeah.
translation.fr: On dit ingénieure en chef, mais oui.

translation.en: I want to work in Formula 1 one day.
When you spun off, you nearly took me out.
translation.fr: Quand tu as dérapé, tu as failli m'éjecter.

translation.en: I think you're mad because I almost beat you.
translation.fr: Tu es fâché car j'ai failli te battre.

translation.en: That's your first and only warning.
translation.fr: Je ne te le redirai pas.

translation.en: He's like a race car guy. Owns a team.
translation.fr: C'est un pilote. Il a une écurie.

translation.en: -Hip hip... -[all] Hooray! -[Mike] Hip hip... -[all] Hooray! -[Mike] Hip hip... -[all] Hooray!

translation.fr: Que fait le gros dur ici ?
Dean ? C'est le frère de Mandy.

translation.en: [Jack] Never gonna beat you, am I, Dad?
translation.fr: Je ne te battrai jamais, papa ?

translation.en: After everything that happened in Sydney,
translation.fr: Après ce qui s'est passé à Sydney, tu reprends ma voiture,

translation.en: you take my car again, two days after we get here.
translation.fr: Après ce qui s'est passé à Sydney, tu reprends ma voiture, deux jours après notre arrivée ?

translation.en: Mum, I was in the middle of nowhere.
translation.fr: J'étais au milieu de nulle part.

translation.en: I mean, there was no traffic.
translation.fr: Il n'y avait pas de circulation.

translation.en: And I'm driving a station wagon.
You were chucking donuts in an empty car park, son.
translation.fr: Tu faisais des donuts dans un parking vide.

translation.en: I apologize, officer. It will not happen again.
translation.fr: Pardon, monsieur l'agent. Ça n'arrivera plus.

translation.en: considering there was no harm done,
translation.fr: Il n'y a pas eu de mal...

translation.en: I'm prepared to let you off with a warning.
If I catch you at it again, you will be in very hot water.
translation.fr: Si je t'y reprends, tu auras de gros ennuis.

translation.en: Well, I should hit the road.

translation.fr: Le bon vieux flic et le trafic.

translation.en: Have you just moved into town?
Yeah, we're taking a lease on a shop on Queen Street.
translation.fr: Oui, on loue un magasin sur Queen Street.

translation.en: Well, I might see you around sometime, at some point.
translation.fr: On se pourrait qu'on se revoit, un jour.

translation.en: Well, why do you keep doing it?
I don't know. That's not a good enough reason, mate.
translation.fr: - Je ne sais pas. - Ce n'est pas une bonne raison.

translation.en: One day, your luck's gonna run out.
I'm hoping that we can build a life here.
You know you can tell me anything.
translation.fr: Tu sais que tu peux tout me dire.

translation.en: -Maybe you want to talk to me about Dad-- -Mum, I'm fine.
translation.fr: - Tu veux me parler de papa... - Maman, ça va.

translation.en: Look. I got sausage because it matches the color of this house.
translation.fr: Regarde. J'ai pris des saucisses de la couleur de cette maison.
CIRCUIT DE KART BUSSELTON Génial. C'est hors de prix.

translation.en: you've been bitten by the racing bug.
translation.fr: Tu as chopé le virus de la course.

translation.en: Is that when you can't stop thinking about how much of a rush it is?
translation.fr: C'est quand on n'arrête pas de penser aux sensations ?

translation.en: And you feel like it's what you were put on earth to do?
translation.fr: Et qu'on a l'impression que c'est notre destin.

translation.en: I reckon you should turn around...
and never speak of it again.
You had one three-lap race in which you spun off and finished last,
translation.fr: Tu as fait une course en trois tours où tu as dérapé et fini dernier,

translation.en: and now you want to make it your life's work?
translation.fr: et tu veux en faire ton job ?

translation.en: You know what would be a better idea?
translation.fr: Tu sais ce qui serait mieux ?
Rassemble chaque dollar que tu as,

translation.en: and your parents have, and your friends have...
translation.fr: et ceux de tes parents, de tes amis...

translation.en: and buy the nicest boat you can.
Park it in the middle of the harbor...
That'd be a better use of your time and money
translation.fr: Ce serait plus utile et économique

translation.en: than trying to make it as a race driver.
Hit the bricks, kid. You don't want this life.
translation.fr: Oublie. Tu veux pas cette vie.

translation.en: -And your prices are too high. -[flies buzzing]
translation.fr: Et vos prix sont trop élevés.

translation.en: We don't open for three hours.
I don't have enough money to pay you to drive here.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas de quoi vous payer.

translation.en: And when I say enough, I mean any.
I've got an idea that could work for both of us.
translation.fr: J'ai une idée pour nous deux.

translation.en: Clearly, this place needs some TLC.
translation.fr: Cet endroit a besoin d'être rénové.

translation.en: So employ me to help out, but instead of paying me...
translation.fr: Alors recrutez-moi pour aider, mais au lieu d'être payé...

translation.en: let me drive three laps of the track for every hour I work.
translation.fr: je fais trois tours par heure travaillée.

translation.en: -Three, because the track is short. -One, because of fuel costs.
translation.fr: - Trois, la piste est courte. - Un, le carburant est cher.

translation.en: Three, and didn't you hear what I said about the track being--
translation.fr: Trois, et vous n'écoutez pas, la piste est...

translation.en: One. And I'm not loving this backchat.
translation.fr: Un. Et je n'aime pas cette insolence.

translation.en: -Would have done it for one. -Would have agreed to three.
translation.fr: - Je l'aurais fait pour un. - J'aurais accepté trois.

translation.en: All right, you can start now.
When the track gets dusty, it's too slippery to race on.
translation.fr: Avec la poussière, la piste glisse.

translation.en: You're gonna spray it with water to keep it intact.
translation.fr: Vaporise-la d'eau pour la garder intacte.

translation.en: You want me to spray the whole track using this?
translation.fr: Je dois pulvériser le circuit avec ça ?

translation.en: Why don't we use that enormous water truck?
translation.fr: Pourquoi ne pas utiliser ce camion ?

translation.en: [Patrick] I trust this backchat won't be an ongoing feature of our conversation.
translation.fr: J'espère que cette insolence ne deviendra pas une habitude.

translation.en: Do not enter my caravan without an invitation.
translation.fr: N'entre pas dans ma caravane sans invitation.

translation.en: Hey. I googled you last night.
translation.fr: Dites. Je vous ai cherché sur Google.

translation.en: It said you used to race cars.
Get to it. You're burning sunlight. Chop chop.
translation.fr: Au travail. Tu gâches du soleil. Plus vite.

translation.en: Oh, well done, you. That's great.
This mean I get to drive?
I can't drive with this thing on.
You've got until sunset to paint the garage with it.
translation.fr: Repeins le garage avant la nuit.

translation.en: Get to it. You're burning sunlight. Chop chop.
translation.fr: Au travail. Tu gâches du soleil. Plus vite.

translation.en: why don't you shove this helmet...
translation.fr: pourquoi ne pas vous mettre ce casque...

translation.en: Does this mean I get to drive?
I need you to wash all these.
translation.fr: Je veux que tu nettoies tout ça.

translation.en: you're gonna do it with your feet.
You know that's super weird, right?
Get to it. You're burning sunlight. Chop chop.
translation.fr: Au travail. Tu gâches du soleil. Plus vite.

translation.en: Can't you offset the top from the center and add more caster?
translation.fr: Pourquoi ne pas excentrer le haut et augmenter le carrossage ?

translation.en: but if you tune it right, it's worth at least a tenth of a second a lap.
translation.fr: mais bien réglé, ça vaut un dixième de seconde par tour.

translation.en: Really? Is that what you reckon?
If that were true, then why aren't other teams doing it?
translation.fr: Alors, pourquoi les autres ne le font pas ?

translation.en: I think we'll stick with what we know.
translation.fr: On s'en tiendra à ce qu'on sait.

translation.en: Leroy wouldn't know a fast kart if it was stapled to--
translation.fr: Leroy ne verrait pas un kart rapide si...
Et il a encore tort. Incroyable.

translation.en: Put me in charge of the kart. I'll be a better chief engineer.
translation.fr: Confie-moi le kart. Je serai meilleure ingénieure en chef.

translation.en: Sweetheart, you know it's not that simple.
translation.fr: Chérie, ce n'est pas si simple.

translation.en: How am I gonna learn if I never do it?
translation.fr: Comment apprendre en ne faisant rien ?

translation.en: Maybe you'll get your chance one day.
translation.fr: Tu auras ta chance un jour.

translation.en: But right now we all need to focus on our jobs so your brother wins Nationals.
translation.fr: Mais on doit se concentrer sur nos tâches, pour que ton frère gagne.

translation.en: I need to do some driving, man.

translation.fr: Le championnat régional est la semaine prochaine.

translation.en: You've got a lot of work to do before you're ready to race.
translation.fr: Tu es loin d'être prêt à courir.

translation.en: Then why am I spraying the track?
translation.fr: Alors pourquoi je pulvérise la piste ?

translation.en: Or painting the walls with my head?
translation.fr: Ou peins les murs avec ma tête ?

translation.en: I need to do some driving.
You'll drive when I say so.
translation.fr: Tu conduiras quand je le dirai.

translation.en: You can't cancel it, it's a deal.
translation.fr: Tu ne peux pas. C'est un accord.
Tu ne feras pas le régional.

translation.en: But I will let you drive.
you're gonna take everything inside that shed and put it in the bin.
translation.fr: tu jetteras tout ce qu'il y a dans cette cabane.

translation.en: I'm gonna turn that into a snack bar.
translation.fr: Je vais en faire un snack bar.

translation.en: -You're burning sunlight-- Chop-- -Yeah, sunlight, I know. Chop chop.
translation.fr: - Tu gâches du... - Soleil, je sais. Plus vite.

translation.en: Looks like one of the Transformers threw up.
translation.fr: On dirait qu'un Transformers a vomi.

translation.en: Man, you scared the hell out of me.
translation.fr: La vache, tu m'as fichu la trouille.

translation.en: Why are you leaping out of shadows?
Of course I couldn't see you!
Can you help me get my kart ready to race at Regionals?
translation.fr: Tu m'aiderais à préparer mon kart ?

translation.en: [Jack] And I don't have any money.
it could end up costing you money.
translation.fr: ça pourrait te coûter de l'argent.

translation.en: Well, since you put it like that...
Well, I don't know anything about karts. And I don't know anyone who does,
translation.fr: Je n'y connais rien en karts. Je ne connais personne qui s'y connaisse.

translation.en: So you're asking me because you didn't have any other choices?
translation.fr: Alors je suis ton seul choix ?

translation.en: And that I think you'd do a good job.
translation.fr: Et tu ferais du bon boulot.

translation.en: -I'll do it, but with one stipulation. -Okay.
translation.fr: - Je le ferai, à une condition. - D'accord.

translation.en: I'm chief engineer. That means I'm in charge of the kart.
translation.fr: Je suis ingénieur en chef. Je suis responsable du kart.

translation.en: [Mandy] You want to race this at Regionals?
translation.fr: Tu veux courir avec ça en régional ?

translation.en: It looks like it was hit by a truck.
translation.fr: Il semble avoir été heurté par un camion.

translation.en: Was it hit by a truck?
That's the way we found it.
Put the engine parts there, the brake parts there,
translation.fr: Mettez le moteur ici, les freins là,

translation.en: the steering parts here, and the exhaust parts here.
translation.fr: la direction ici et l'échappement là.

translation.en: Clearly, we need to start from basics.
translation.fr: On doit clairement partir des bases.

translation.en: Okay, listen closely. There'll be an exam afterwards.
translation.fr: Écoutez bien. Il y aura un examen après.

translation.en: Will there really be an exam?
translation.fr: Il y aura vraiment un exam ?

translation.en: No, Colin. That's the axle. This is the brake disc.
translation.fr: Non, Colin. Ça c'est l'essieu. Voici le disque de frein.
- Elle est cool. - C'est l'étrier de frein.

translation.en: -I'm just happy there isn't an exam. -Yeah.
translation.fr: - Je suis content, y a pas d'exam. - Oui.
Tu sais ce qui est moche ?
La lenteur. Et il n'est pas lent.

translation.en: So where do we test drive it?
Are you sure we're meant to be driving on this?
translation.fr: Tu es sûr qu'on doit conduire ça ?

translation.en: Sometimes you don't ask for permission, Col.
translation.fr: Parfois, on ne demande pas la permission.

translation.en: You just do it and apologize later.
translation.fr: On fait et on s'excuse après.

translation.en: Now, this is a test drive, so take it slow.
translation.fr: C'est un essai, alors vas-y doucement.

translation.en: I don't think he heard you.

translation.fr: - On se voit demain au circuit ? - Oui...

translation.en: about that. This was a one-off.
If my dad finds out I helped a rival team...
translation.fr: Si mon père apprend que j'ai aidé une équipe rivale...

translation.en: he'll go off like a frog in a sock.
Don't go on the outside of the track like you did at my party.
translation.fr: Ne va pas sur l'extérieur comme à ma fête.

translation.en: If you get on the marbles, you will slide off.
translation.fr: Si tu roules sur les billes, tu glisseras.

translation.en: Hey, what if we get you a funnel?
translation.fr: Et si on te trouvait un entonnoir ?

translation.en: That'd be faster. Then I could just pour it right in there.
translation.fr: Ce serait plus rapide. Je pourrais verser dedans.

translation.en: Are you working at that kart place today?
I'll get Colin to FaceTime you.
You know you can't let them treat you like that.
translation.fr: Tu peux pas les laisser te traiter ainsi.

translation.en: I know. I just don't know what to do about it.
translation.fr: Je sais. Mais je ne sais pas quoi faire.

translation.en: No way. I don't want to miss out on an adventure.
translation.fr: Pas question. Je ne veux pas rater une aventure.

translation.en: title favorite Dean Zeta is in first place!
translation.fr: le favori Dean Zeta est en pole position !

translation.en: In second is Jess Hoyt, with Juliet Kay a solid third.
translation.fr: Chase Hoy est deuxième et Juliet Kay est troisième.

translation.en: Top three finishers in the upcoming final
move straight through to the State Championships.
[in unison] I attack until I lead. I take no prisoners.
translation.fr: J'attaque jusqu'à mener. Je ne fais pas de quartier.

translation.en: Whoever said winning isn't everything is a fool who knows nothing.
translation.fr: Celui qui dit que gagner ne fait pas tout est un idiot ignorant.

translation.en: [announcer] This race is in the KA3 class.
translation.fr: C'est une course de catégorie KA3.

translation.en: the top three finishers go straight through to the State Championship.
translation.fr: les trois finalistes iront au championnat d'État.

translation.en: It's my son's first race today.
Okay, here they come, folks, in formation. Two by two.
translation.fr: D'accord, les gars, en formation. Deux par deux.

translation.en: We're getting set for a start. Green light's on.
translation.fr: Parés au départ. Le feu vert est allumé.
On fait la course, les gars.

translation.en: Oh! That was a lunge, with a capital L!
Dean Zeta takes the lead, and he's streaking away.
translation.fr: Dean Zeta prend la tête et il se démarque.

translation.en: And young Hooper now thunders through into tenth place.
translation.fr: Le jeune Hooper passe maintenant dixième.

translation.en: He is wearing this go-kart like an old suit!
translation.fr: Il est très à l'aise avec ce kart.

translation.en: He's going after the champagne, the glory, and the gold!
translation.fr: Il veut le champagne, la gloire et les filles.

translation.en: Come on, Hooper! You can do it, son!
translation.fr: Allez, Hooper ! Tu peux le faire.

translation.en: He uses the whole of the track.
He's got his eyes on first place for sure.
translation.fr: Il vise la première place, pour sûr.

translation.en: -Jack Hooper takes fourth. -Come on, get out of the way!
translation.fr: - Jack Hooper est quatrième. - Allez, bouge !

translation.en: [Mandy] Don't go on the outside of the track. You will slide off.
translation.fr: Ne va pas à l'extérieur ou tu glisseras.

translation.en: [Patrick] What the hell are you doing?
-Coming third in my first race. -But I told you you weren't ready.
translation.fr: Première course, troisième. On n'était pas prêts.

translation.en: Which you just proved by making that reckless overtake.
translation.fr: Tu l'as prouvé avec ce dépassement imprudent.

translation.en: That overtake got me through to States.
translation.fr: Ce dépassement m'a valu le podium.

translation.en: Yeah. It could have put you in a coffin.
translation.fr: Oui. Il aurait pu te tuer.

translation.en: I had a lot of help from my mates.
translation.fr: J'ai reçu l'aide de mes amis.

translation.en: And I... I need help from you too.
translation.fr: Et... j'ai besoin de la vôtre aussi.

translation.en: -[groans] -When I say coach, I mean teach me everything I need to know about driving.
translation.fr: Par là, j'entends m'apprendre tout ce que je dois savoir sur la conduite.

translation.en: I don't wanna be doing any more of this spraying
translation.fr: Je ne veux plus pulvériser, ni peindre,

translation.en: or painting or cleaning with my feet.
All of that was to improve your fitness. All right?
translation.fr: C'était pour améliorer ta condition physique.

translation.en: The spraying develops your arms, so they don't get tired when you steer.
translation.fr: Pulvériser développe tes bras, pour ne pas te fatiguer au volant.

translation.en: The painting strengthens your neck, so you can handle the G-forces when you corner.
translation.fr: Peindre renforce ton cou, pour supporter la force G en virage.

translation.en: The cleaning improves your ankles' flexibility,
so you can work the pedals faster.
This is exactly why I need you to be my coach.
translation.fr: Voila pourquoi j'ai besoin que vous m'entraîniez.

translation.en: I will coach you, but you are gonna do everything I say.
translation.fr: Je vais t'entraîner, mais tu feras tout ce que je te dirai.

translation.en: Oh, those corn are great, by the way. You're gonna love it.
translation.fr: Ces maïs sont super. Vous allez adorer.

translation.en: I'm gonna get you to pull over and, uh, turn off your ignition, please.
translation.fr: Je vais te demander de t'arrêter et de couper le contact.

translation.en: [Barry] Your mother is going to be very disappointed.
translation.fr: Ta mère va être très déçue.

translation.en: I'm ordering you to stop the vehicle.
What on earth do you think you're doing, mate?
translation.fr: Tu crois faire quoi, mon pote ?

translation.en: I need you to ask my mother out on a date.
translation.fr: Je dois vous demander d'inviter ma mère à sortir.

translation.en: -And why would I want to do that? -Because you like her.
translation.fr: - Pourquoi je ferais ça ? - Parce que vous l'aimez.

translation.en: I hope your conversation skills are better than this on the date.
translation.fr: J'espère que vous parlerez mieux pendant le rencard.

translation.en: There isn't gonna be any date, mate.
translation.fr: Il n'y aura pas de rencard, mon pote.

translation.en: -Why not? -What makes you even think I like her?
translation.fr: - Pourquoi ? - Tu crois que je l'aime ?

translation.en: Ha! See? There it is. That's the type of cheeky banter my mother loves.
translation.fr: Vous voyez ? C'est le genre de plaisanteries de ma mère.

translation.en: Why are you asking me to do this?
You're a cop, so you're probably not a criminal.
translation.fr: Vous êtes flic, donc pas un criminel.

translation.en: And you're not wearing a wedding ring. You are single, right?
translation.fr: Je vois pas d'alliance. Vous êtes célibataire ?

translation.en: And I'm guessing your dad's out of the picture.
translation.fr: J'imagine que ton père n'est plus là.

translation.en: So, uh, what do you reckon?
when I talk to women socially,
I have been known to freeze up from time to time.
translation.fr: il m'arrive de me figer de temps en temps.

translation.en: -Make that all of the time. -Okay, well...
translation.fr: - En fait, tout le temps. - Eh bien...

translation.en: Take a moment to come up with an opening line.
Would you like to go out to dinner with me?
translation.fr: Ça vous dirait de dîner avec moi ?

translation.en: Why do you have an accent all of a sudden?
Okay, let's try it again. One more time, yeah?
Would you like to go out to dinner with me sometime?
translation.fr: Ça vous dirait de dîner avec moi ?

translation.en: Can I help you with anything?
Christie, I was wondering if you'd, uh...
translation.fr: Christie, je me demandais si vous...

translation.en: like to go out to dinner with me sometime... next week.
translation.fr: voudriez dîner avec moi... la semaine prochaine ?

translation.en: Didn't need to make those changes to the kart after all.
translation.fr: Pas besoin d'apporter ces changements au kart.

translation.en: The kart was fast. I won.
translation.fr: Le kart était rapide. J'ai gagné.

translation.en: If your kart was fast, you would have pulled away.
translation.fr: Si ton kart était rapide, tu les aurais distancés.

translation.en: But you won by half a length.
translation.fr: Mais tu as gagné de peu.

translation.en: If you started anywhere but the front, you would have lost.
translation.fr: Si tu n'avais pas commencé en tête, tu aurais perdu.

translation.en: I've been asked out on a date.
I don't know what you did, but...
translation.fr: J'ignore ce que tu as fait, mais...

translation.en: I'm sure I have no idea what you're talking about.
translation.fr: Je ne vois pas du tout de quoi tu parles.

translation.en: You know you don't have to fix everything, right?
translation.fr: Tu n'es pas obligé de tout arranger.

translation.en: You don't always have to be the strong one.
translation.fr: Tu n'es pas obligé d'être fort.

translation.en: It's okay if you want to, you know...
Backchat. It will also be used as a teaching aid.
translation.fr: L'insolence. Il aidera aussi à l'enseignement.

translation.en: Place your hands on the wheel.
The correct position is nine o'clock and three o'clock.
translation.fr: La position correcte est à neuf heures et trois heures.

translation.en: You'll always know which way your front wheels are pointing
translation.fr: Tu sais toujours où pointent tes roues avant

translation.en: if your hands mirror their position on the steering wheel.
translation.fr: si tes mains reflètent leur position sur le volant.

translation.en: When the wheel's turned, a string will be tied on the accelerator.
translation.fr: Quand le volant tourne, une ficelle est reliée à l'accélérateur.

translation.en: You won't be able to press it without snapping it.
translation.fr: Tu ne pourras pas appuyer sans la rompre.

translation.en: it'll start to give you some slack.
translation.fr: et elle te donnera du mou.

translation.en: I want you to drive as fast as you can.
translation.fr: Conduis aussi vite que tu peux.

translation.en: But you don't snap the string.
translation.fr: Mais ne romps pas la ficelle.

translation.en: You keep your hands at nine and three at all times.
translation.fr: Garde tes mains à neuf heures et trois heures

translation.en: [Patrick] You've got to find that balance between the accelerator
translation.fr: Tu dois trouver l'équilibre entre l'accélérateur

translation.en: Not so easy breezy now, is it? Huh?
Hey. What if the race line is blocked?
translation.fr: Hé. Et si la ligne est bloquée ?

translation.en: I mean, how do I get past?
Well, each situation's different, so there's no right answer.
translation.fr: Chaque situation est différente, il n'y a pas de bonne réponse.

translation.en: But I like to apply the rules of the overtake.
translation.fr: Mais j'aime appliquer les règles du dépassement.

translation.en: analyze what each driver is doing,
translation.fr: analyse ce que font les autres

translation.en: and take advantage of any mistake.
Feeling sorry for yourself isn't gonna make you a better driver,
translation.fr: Te lamenter ne te rendra pas meilleur.

translation.en: it's just gonna make you annoying to be around.
translation.fr: Ça va juste te rendre énervant.

translation.en: Yeah, but it pisses me off.
it said that you retired from racing in the middle of the season.
translation.fr: j'ai vu que vous aviez arrêté en pleine saison.

translation.en: She never says hi to us.
Remember your balance here. Take a tighter line.
translation.fr: Souviens-toi, l'équilibre. Suis mieux la ligne.

translation.en: That's the first time I've seen your teeth.
You've got a long road ahead of you.
You've got to prepare your kart for State. Your friends are gonna help again?
translation.fr: Tu dois préparer ton kart. Tes amis t'aideront ?

translation.en: Is he the one who made it quick?
[Jack] He just found out the engine runs on petrol.
translation.fr: Il a découvert que c'était un moteur à essence.

translation.en: We need the one who made it quick.
translation.fr: On a besoin de celui qui l'a fait.
Tu ne pouvais pas me voir ?

translation.en: We've been over this. They're shadows.
translation.fr: On en a déjà parlé. C'est sombre.

translation.en: I wouldn't have made it through to State without you.
translation.fr: Je ne serais pas qualifié sans toi.
Tu peux le rendre plus rapide ?

translation.en: I don't know if I want to.

translation.fr: - Pourquoi ? - Parce que tu ne m'as pas écoutée.

translation.en: I told you not to go on the outside of the track,
translation.fr: Je t'ai dit pas à l'extérieur,

translation.en: and that's exactly what you did.
The trick is to find a way to unblock it.
translation.fr: Le truc, c'est de trouver un moyen de le débloquer.

translation.en: I need to know this stuff.
You only say that because you want me to help you.
translation.fr: Tu dis ça car tu veux que je t'aide.

translation.en: That doesn't mean it's not true.
I'll take that as a definite maybe.
translation.fr: Je prends ça comme un peut-être.

translation.en: Is this all your handiwork, Jack?
You're working with Mike Zeta's daughter?
translation.fr: Tu bosses avec la fille de Mike Zeta ?

translation.en: Yeah, and he can't find out I'm doing this.
translation.fr: Oui, et il ne doit pas le découvrir.

translation.en: All in favor of Mandy being chief engineer?
translation.fr: Qui veut Mandy comme ingénieure en chef ?

translation.en: You said you wanted the one who made it quick.
translation.fr: Vous vouliez celui qui l'a fait.

translation.en: I really appreciate you helping me out.
I want to say thank you by...
Yep. [Colin] I'll go see if Patrick needs anything.
translation.fr: - Oui. - Je vais voir si Patrick a besoin d'aide.

translation.en: I thought it'd be cool to see what you guys do for fun-ness around here.
translation.fr: J'ai pensé que ce serait cool de voir comment on s'amuse ici.

translation.en: I'll meet you at the Rollerdrome tomorrow at six.
translation.fr: On se retrouve au roller demain, à six heures.

translation.en: What the hell are you doing?
I had to drop off your keys.
Right, and somehow break a $150 Thomastik-Infeld D string.
translation.fr: Oui, et casser une corde Thomastik-Infeld D à 150 $.

translation.en: Thing is, I've got a date with your mother tonight.
translation.fr: Le truc, c'est que j'ai un rencard avec ta mère ce soir.

translation.en: I've come to realize that I don't know what she likes.
translation.fr: Je réalise que j'ignore ce qu'elle aime.

translation.en: Just give me a second, mate.
I'm just... I'm afraid she's gonna think I'm really boring.
translation.fr: J'ai peur qu'elle me trouve ennuyeux.

translation.en: Look, don't talk about yourself too much. Ask questions.
translation.fr: Écoutez, ne parlez pas trop de vous. Posez des questions.

translation.en: -Where'd you get all this stuff? -My dad.
translation.fr: - D'où tu tiens ça ? - Mon père.

translation.en: Well, he was a very wise man.
I mean, most of the time, you're covered in grease.
translation.fr: La plupart du temps, tu es couverte de graisse.

translation.en: You just looked around, saw the Humongous Claw,
translation.fr: T'as regardé autour, vu la machine

translation.en: That doesn't mean it's not fun.
Hey, do you wanna go and see the new Steve Carell movie tonight?
translation.fr: Tu veux voir le nouveau film de Steve Carell ce soir ?

translation.en: That'd be great. [stammers] It's playing up at the Orana Cinema.
translation.fr: - Ce serait génial. - Il passe au cinéma Orana.

translation.en: if you wanted to, we could go to the Jade Temple.
translation.fr: on pourrait aller au Temple de Jade ?

translation.en: Are you singing a Daryl Braithwaite song?
I've never heard of him. Actually, that's not true.
translation.fr: Jamais entendu parler de lui. En fait, c'est faux.

translation.en: -Why would you do that? -I don't know.
Someone told me that you liked him, so I thought I'd impress you.
translation.fr: On m'a dit que tu aimais, j'ai pensé t'impressionner.

translation.en: Look, why don't we do something that we'd both like to do?
translation.fr: Pourquoi ne pas faire ce qu'on aime tous les deux ?

translation.en: So no Steve Carell, no Daryl Braithwaite, no Chinese restaurant,
translation.fr: Pas de Steve Carell, pas de Daryl Braithwaite, pas de resto chinois,

translation.en: no whatever else my son said that I'd like.
translation.fr: rien de ce que mon fils a dit que j'aime.

translation.en: Although I'd still like Chinese food. Do you want to do that?
translation.fr: Même si j'adore la cuisine chinoise. Ça te dit ?

translation.en: Oh, good. Yeah, I'm dying for a dim sim.
translation.fr: Oui, je meurs d'envie d'un dim sim.

translation.en: [Mandy] If you finish in the top three and you make it through to Nationals,
translation.fr: Si tu finis sur le podium et que tu vas en national,

translation.en: it's my first step towards becoming the next Leena Gade.
translation.fr: je serai peut-être la prochaine Leena Gade.

translation.en: She's the first woman to engineer a car that won Le Mans.
translation.fr: - Qui ? - C'est la première femme à avoir conçu une voiture qui a gagné Le Mans.

translation.en: I want to be her but in Formula 1.
translation.fr: Je veux être elle, mais en Formule 1.

translation.en: Well, we'd better win then, hey?
[Mandy] My dad and I used to come here when I was little.
translation.fr: Mon père et moi venions ici quand j'étais petite.

translation.en: We haven't been for a while.

translation.fr: Il est mort quand j'avais 11 ans.

translation.en: Oh, man. And here I am blabbering on.
translation.fr: Oh, mince. Et moi qui jacasse.

translation.en: [chuckles] We used to drive around on the weekends in his old car.
translation.fr: On roulait le week-end dans sa vieille voiture.

translation.en: I'm sorry. This was supposed to be fun.
Actually, this is the most fun-ness I've had in a long time.
translation.fr: En fait, c'est ma meilleure soirée depuis longtemps.

translation.en: You know, R2-D2 speaks perfect English in the Star Wars movies,
translation.fr: R2-D2 parle parfaitement français dans les Star Wars,

translation.en: but all we hear are the beeps,
because he loves to drop the f-bomb so much. [chuckles]
That's my brother and his ass clown mates.
translation.fr: Mon frère et ses potes abrutis.

translation.en: Well, it was fun while it lasted.
So? We work all night and hit Dean where it hurts. On the track.
translation.fr: Et ? On travaille la nuit et on frappe Dean où ça fait mal. Sur le circuit.

translation.en: Personally, I'd rather hit him in the nuts, but...
translation.fr: Perso, je préférerais dans les noix, mais...

translation.en: We need a new brake disc. This one is toast.
translation.fr: Il nous faut un nouveau disque de frein. Celui-ci est mort.

translation.en: [Mandy] My dad won't give me anything
translation.fr: Mon père me donnera rien s'il apprend que je bosse

translation.en: if he finds out I'm working with a rival team.
translation.fr: Mon père me donnera rien s'il apprend que je bosse avec une équipe rivale.

translation.en: Look, I'm sure you'll do great in prison,
translation.fr: Je suis sûr que la prison vous irait bien,

translation.en: but my delicate constitution isn't suited to a life behind bars.
translation.fr: mais ma fragilité ne permet pas une vie derrière les barreaux.

translation.en: [Mandy] No one's going to prison, Colin.
We're just gonna fix what they destroyed.
translation.fr: On va réparer ce qu'ils ont cassé.

translation.en: Now, keep your balaclavas on. There's cameras everywhere.
translation.fr: Gardez vos cagoules. Il y a des caméras partout.

translation.en: So if anyone approaches the building, you have to let us know.
translation.fr: Si quelqu'un approche, tu nous préviens.

translation.en: [Colin] All right. If I see anyone coming, I'll make a bird sound like...
translation.fr: D'accord. Si je vois quelqu'un, je ferai un bruit d'oiseau comme...
- Un, deux... - On en est déjà à deux ?

translation.en: [Ted laughs snidely] I'll bet you're last! [Dean] Here comes the ankle tap! Oh!
-[Ted] Dean, tell us the code. -[Dean] You're dreaming.
Fire up the PlayStation. I'll get some drinks.
translation.fr: Allume la console. Je cherche à boire.

translation.en: -Shotgun player one! -You're always player one. It's my turn.
translation.fr: - Je suis joueur un ! - C'est toujours toi. À moi.

translation.en: [Ted] I'm player one. I'm the best.
translation.fr: Moi d'abord. Je suis le meilleur.

translation.en: [Ralph] Hey, Dean. Get me a lemonade.

translation.fr: Il a quoi cet oiseau débile ?

translation.en: [Ralph] Ralph, three. Ted, nothing. You ain't gonna stop me.
translation.fr: Ralph, trois. Ted, rien. Tu m'arrêteras pas.

translation.en: -'Cause I'm the best! -[Dean] Coming right up.

translation.fr: On a volé un disque de frein.

translation.en: That's the lamest thing you've ever said.
translation.fr: T'as jamais rien dit d'aussi naze !

translation.en: It's amazing you don't get heartburn.
Ah, it's all right. I'll just get Colin to FaceTime you.
translation.fr: C'est bon. Colin te fera un FaceTime.

translation.en: I like to call it FT.
-Don't do that scary sliding thing. -Don't worry, Mum.
translation.fr: - Pas de dérapage. - T'inquiète pas, maman.

translation.en: [woman] You're clearly favorite to take the Under-16 State Championship.
translation.fr: Vous êtes le favori du championnat des moins de 16 ans.

translation.en: Are you confident of a win?
Yes, well, of course I would love to win State this year.
translation.fr: Oui, bien sûr, j'adorerais gagner cette année.

translation.en: But, at this point in time, I'm just taking it one day after the next.
translation.fr: Mais en ce moment, je vis un jour après l'autre.

translation.en: [Jack] Let me give you a tip.
Everybody takes it one day after the next.
translation.fr: Tout le monde vit un jour après l'autre.

translation.en: See you at the finish line.
Mate, you've got to stand up to him, okay?
translation.fr: Tu dois lui tenir tête, d'accord ?

translation.en: Hi. I'm here to register for the Under-16s.
translation.fr: Je viens m'inscrire aux moins de 16 ans.

translation.en: and title favorite Dean Zeta is in first place.
translation.fr: et le favori du titre, Dean Zeta, est premier.

translation.en: You're gonna be a lot faster with some new tires on.
translation.fr: Tu seras plus rapide avec des pneus neufs.

translation.en: It's a good thing I brought a set then, isn't it?
Remember the rules of the overtake.
Analyze what the other drivers are doing.
translation.fr: Analyse ce que font les autres.
Il n'y a pas de danse.

translation.en: Aren't you gonna give me a motivational speech?
I mean something rousingly inspirational about never giving up,
translation.fr: Je veux dire un truc exaltant, sur ne jamais abandonner,

translation.en: and doing your best, and the eye of the tiger and all that?
translation.fr: faire de son mieux, l'œil du tigre et tout ça ?

translation.en: I mean, I could do all that. It would feel a bit forced now.
translation.fr: Je pourrais. Ce serait un peu forcé maintenant.

translation.en: I mean, that stuff's got to be spontaneous.
[in unison] I attack until I lead. I take no prisoners. I never concede.
translation.fr: J'attaque jusqu'à mener. Je ne fais pas de quartier. Je ne cède jamais.

translation.en: Whoever said winning isn't everything is a fool who knows nothing.
translation.fr: Celui qui dit que gagner ne fait pas tout est un idiot ignorant.

translation.en: let's see how fast you really are.
the top three finishers will advance to the National finals.
translation.fr: les trois meilleurs iront en finale nationale.

translation.en: Dean Zeta leads with daylight second.
translation.fr: Dean Zeta a une avance confortable.

translation.en: They're traveling at 100 km an hour a few millimeters above the ground.
translation.fr: Ils se déplacent à 100 km/h à quelques millimètres du sol.

translation.en: You make your own luck in a kart.
translation.fr: On crée sa chance sur un kart.

translation.en: And Jack Hooper slices through the field.
translation.fr: Et Jack Hooper coupe le terrain.

translation.en: Jack Hooper has a monster lunge down the back straight
translation.fr: Jack Hooper a vraiment le vent en poupe

translation.en: [announcer] Storming performance from the new boy from Busselton.
translation.fr: Quelle performance du petit nouveau de Busselton !

translation.en: He's hugging the inside of the track like it's his favorite granny.
translation.fr: Il embrasse l'intérieur comme si c'était sa grand-mère.

translation.en: Remember the rules of the overtake.
Analyze what the other drivers are doing.
translation.fr: Analyse ce que font les autres.

translation.en: The top three can cruise home from here, and they'll be through to the Nationals.
translation.fr: Les trois meilleurs iront en championnat national

translation.en: Hooper throws one up the inside and steals it.
[Jack] I'm coming for you, dude man.
A beautifully-constructed pass, but also completely unnecessary.
translation.fr: Un dépassement magnifique, mais aussi totalement inutile.

translation.en: Hooper didn't get the memo about holding positions.
translation.fr: Hooper ne veut pas tenir sa position.

translation.en: Hooper tries to dive for first.
-[Jack's dad] Show no fear. -[Mandy] Don't go on the outside.

translation.fr: Il perd le contrôle ! Oh non !

translation.en: [Patrick] I told you you weren't ready.
[Mandy] Get on the marbles, you will slide off.
translation.fr: Sur les billes, tu vas glisser.
Ils se qualifient pour le championnat national.

translation.en: Jack Hooper finished fourth and backwards over the finishing line.
translation.fr: Jack Hooper a terminé quatrième et à l'envers sur la ligne d'arrivée.

translation.en: You were second and we were on our way to Nationals,
translation.fr: Tu étais deuxième, et on allait en national, mais tu as abandonné tout ça

translation.en: and instead you threw it away
translation.fr: et on allait en national, mais tu as abandonné tout ça

translation.en: by making a reckless move that wasted all our time and effort.
translation.fr: par un geste téméraire qui a tout gâché.

translation.en: I just had to beat him.
And you didn't even qualify, so you could beat him when it counted.
translation.fr: Tu ne t'es même pas qualifié, pour le battre quand ça compte.

translation.en: You put yourself ahead of the team,
translation.fr: Tu te fais passer avant l'équipe,

translation.en: and I can't be with someone who does that.
translation.fr: je ne peux pas être avec quelqu'un qui fait ça.

translation.en: Looks like you backed the wrong horse, mate.
translation.fr: Tu as misé sur le mauvais.

translation.en: Come on. Help us load this in.
Come on. We're doing this for you. Chop chop.
translation.fr: Allez. On fait ça pour toi. Plus vite.

translation.en: you'd still be in that caravan hiding from the world,
translation.fr: vous seriez encore caché dans cette caravane,

translation.en: You know, that was a bit harsh.
translation.fr: Tu sais, c'est un peu dur.

translation.en: -I saw the accident. -Don't want to talk about it.
-Well, I do. -Don't want to talk about it, Mum.
translation.fr: - Si. - Je veux pas en parler.

translation.en: -I don't think you should race anymore. -You don't have to worry about it!
translation.fr: - Tu devrais arrêter la course. - T'en fais pas.

translation.en: I didn't make it through to Nationals!
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas passé en national.

translation.en: [Jack's dad] Look after your mum when I'm gone, mate.
translation.fr: Prends soin de ta mère quand je serai parti.

translation.en: -♪ I found notes that you hid ♪ -Jack!
-[Christie] That's it, there. There. -[Barry] All right.
Jack, you've got to talk to me.
Why do you keep doing this?
Me and Dad used to do them when we drove around.
translation.fr: Papa et moi en faisions quand on roulait.

translation.en: So I take your car out and for a little while, I just...
translation.fr: Je prends ta voiture et l'espace d'un instant...

translation.en: And I don't know how to fix it.
Some things you just can't fix.
But this pain that you feel...
translation.fr: Mais la douleur que tu ressens...

translation.en: I mean, it's already happening, and I don't want it to.
translation.fr: Ça arrive déjà, et je ne veux pas.

translation.en: I don't want to forget him.
Oh, we won't let that happen.
Just let it out. You'll feel better.
Yeah, well, Dad said blokes only get three cries in life.
translation.fr: Papa disait que les mecs ne pleurent que trois fois.

translation.en: And if I have to choose between this
translation.fr: Et si je dois choisir entre ça

translation.en: until you lose it and steal my car again...
translation.fr: jusqu'à devenir fou et voler ma voiture...

translation.en: Mate, I know you're there. I can see your curtains twitching.
translation.fr: Je sais que tu es là. Je vois tes rideaux bouger.

translation.en: I know what I said was terrible, and I'm an idiot.
translation.fr: Ce que j'ai dit était horrible, et je suis un idiot.

translation.en: And I don't deserve you as my bestie.
translation.fr: Je te mérite pas comme meilleur ami.

translation.en: The driver who came second at State had an illegal carburetor.
translation.fr: Le pilote arrivé deuxième avait un carburateur illégal.

translation.en: And I've been promoted to third.
And I can race at Nationals.
I managed to piss off everyone on my team,
and you don't want me to do it anyway.
translation.fr: et tu ne veux pas que je fasse ça.

translation.en: Well, if it's something that you really love...
I guess I'll just have to be brave.
Just get your team back together.
You know, girls kind of like it when you apologize.
translation.fr: Tu sais, les filles aiment quand vous vous excusez.

translation.en: Heard you lucked through to Nationals.
translation.fr: On m'a dit que tu passais en national.

translation.en: And that means you're gonna need to fix your kart.
translation.fr: Tu vas devoir réparer ton kart.

translation.en: And I'm not gonna let you steal any more of our parts.
translation.fr: Je ne te laisserai plus voler nos pièces.

translation.en: You do need to be punished for the last time you robbed us.
translation.fr: Tu dois être puni pour ton dernier vol.

translation.en: -Standing up to them. Showing no fear. -I love it!
-Does it mean you accept my apology? -Yeah, but don't do it again.
translation.fr: - Tu acceptes mes excuses ? - Oui, mais le refais pas.

translation.en: I shouldn't have said what I said.
I was upset, and I took it out on you.
translation.fr: J'étais contrarié, et je me suis défoulé sur vous.

translation.en: And I hope you can forgive me.
because you did get me out of the caravan.
translation.fr: car tu m'as fait sortir de la caravane.

translation.en: You want to get out one more time?
The driver who came second at State was disqualified.
translation.fr: Le pilote arrivé second est disqualifié.

translation.en: we're going to Nationals in his place.
translation.fr: on va en national à sa place.

translation.en: And I can't go through something like that again.
translation.fr: Et je ne peux pas revivre ça.

translation.en: Look, I'm trying to push it to the limit.
You don't want to be fearless.
translation.fr: Tu ne veux pas être intrépide.

translation.en: You don't want that. Fear is good.
Fear tells you when you push too far.
translation.fr: La peur te dit quand tu vas trop loin.

translation.en: Doesn't it separate the winners from everyone else?
translation.fr: C'est pas comme ça qu'on gagne ?

translation.en: No. It separates the dead men from those that get to go home.
translation.fr: Non. C'est comme ça qu'on meurt.

translation.en: It's why I was reluctant to help you in the first place.
translation.fr: C'est pour ça que j'ai hésité à t'aider.

translation.en: Because, honestly, when I saw you racing for the first time,
translation.fr: Car, quand je t'ai vu courir pour la première fois,

translation.en: it was like I was watching myself.
translation.fr: je me suis vu en toi.

translation.en: And I thought I could help you avoid some of the mistakes that I've made.
translation.fr: Je voulais t'aider à éviter les erreurs que j'ai commises.

translation.en: We were racing. I was behind my teammate, and I...
translation.fr: On courait. J'étais derrière mon coéquipier et j'ai...

translation.en: tried an overtake which was risky, stupid.
And we clipped, and I sent him into the wall.
translation.fr: On s'est percutés et je l'ai envoyé dans le mur.

translation.en: Was it the guy in the photo?
translation.fr: C'était le type sur la photo ?

translation.en: Trying to be fearless on the track, I ended up killing...
translation.fr: En essayant d'être intrépide sur le circuit, j'ai fini par tuer...

translation.en: a man who was very important to me.
translation.fr: un homme qui m'était très cher.

translation.en: So, honestly, I don't think I'm the right man to be teaching you--
translation.fr: Honnêtement, je ne suis pas le bon pour t'enseigner.

translation.en: Let me show you at Nationals.
But you've taught me a lot.
Let me show you at Nationals.
What was the first thing I ever told you?
translation.fr: Je t'ai dit quoi en premier ?

translation.en: The stuff about sinking the boat?
That I don't want a life in motor racing?
translation.fr: Que je ne veux pas d'une vie de pilote ?

translation.en: Come on. We've got a kart to fix.
translation.fr: Venez. On a un kart à réparer.
Tu ne peux pas faire ça.

translation.en: See how you've been muscled wide by that kid?
translation.fr: Tu vois que tu as été écarté par ce gosse ?

translation.en: You need to be more aggressive defending your position.
translation.fr: Tu dois mieux défendre ta position...

translation.en: [woman on TV] ...come from all around the region.
Loads of talent from all the young kids.
I want to throw it to the principal and the band master
translation.fr: Je veux demander au directeur et au chef de groupe

translation.en: to tell us about what sort of music they're gonna play.
translation.fr: quel genre de musique ils vont jouer.

translation.en: Who are you, and what have you done with my son?
translation.fr: Qui es-tu et qu'as-tu fait de mon fils ?

translation.en: [chuckles] See? I do listen to you.
-Wish me luck. -Luck. I'll see you there.
translation.fr: - Souhaite-moi bonne chance. - Bonne chance. On se voit là-bas.

translation.en: Rounding up the qualifying session from the KA3
translation.fr: On termine les qualifications de la KA3,

translation.en: and it's nationals title favorite Dean Zeta sitting on pole position.
translation.fr: et c'est le favori du titre, Dean Zeta, qui est en pole position.

translation.en: My steering was all over the shop.
translation.fr: Ma direction partait dans tous les sens.

translation.en: I've got no idea what that is.
I know I was handed the keys to the...
translation.fr: Je sais que quand j'ai eu...

translation.en: and dropped them in the moat.
translation.fr: Je les ai jetées dans les douves.

translation.en: What I'm trying to say is...
I'm sorry for what I did.
If I could go back and change it...
translation.fr: Si je pouvais revenir en arrière...

translation.en: You think adding that second please will make the difference between me saying yes or no?
translation.fr: Tu crois que le répéter me fera changer d'avis ?

translation.en: [announcer] With water on the track, there won't be much grip,
translation.fr: Le circuit mouillé, l'adhérence sera faible,

translation.en: so we'll see the karts slip and slide around the corners tonight.
translation.fr: nous verrons des karts déraper ce soir.

translation.en: It should make for an epic race.
translation.fr: Ça va être une course épique.

translation.en: So keeps missing the apexes, right?
translation.fr: Il rate les points de cordes, c'est ça ?

translation.en: It looked like he was driving a box of cats.
translation.fr: Il semblait conduire un carton de chats.

translation.en: We've got 20 minutes till the race.
translation.fr: On a 20 minutes avant la course.

translation.en: Of course I can. It's me.
What do you think you're doing?
I'm chief engineer of this kart.
translation.fr: Je suis l'ingénieure en chef de ce kart.

translation.en: What did you think I was gonna do?
translation.fr: Tu pensais que je ferais quoi ?

translation.en: Wait around, sorting bolts for people who don't appreciate me?
translation.fr: Attendre, trier les boulons pour des gens qui ne m'apprécient pas ?

translation.en: You never let me work on the kart. We built this using my ideas.
translation.fr: Je peux jamais travailler sur le kart. On a construit ça avec mes idées.

translation.en: It cost one tenth of yours, and it's quick enough to beat it.
translation.fr: Il coûte un dixième du tien, et il peut le battre.

translation.en: I'm not discussing this in front of strangers.
translation.fr: Je ne parle pas de ça devant des inconnus.

translation.en: "They're not strangers, Dad. They're my team."
translation.fr: "C'est pas des inconnus, papa. C'est mon équipe."

translation.en: Thank you. Now let's fix this kart and win this thing, yeah?
translation.fr: Merci. Réparons ce kart et gagnons, d'accord ?

translation.en: Whoever said winning isn't everything is a fool who knows nothing.
translation.fr: Celui qui dit que gagner ne fait pas tout est un idiot ignorant.

translation.en: [announcer] Last call for entrants for the KA3 final.
translation.fr: Dernier appel pour la finale de la KA3.

translation.en: You're required in the marshaling area immediately.
translation.fr: On vous attend en zone de rassemblement.

translation.en: I'll try not to be, but I...
Yeah, it's called the red mist. Keep it open.
translation.fr: C'est la brume rouge. Laissez ouvert.

translation.en: Yeah. It happens to a lot of people.
translation.fr: Oui. Ça arrive à plein de monde.

translation.en: Believe me, if you want to have any success on the track
you're gonna have to learn how to control it.
translation.fr: tu dois apprendre à la contrôler.
- D'accord. Comment je fais ? - Eh bien...

translation.en: the only thing that ever worked for me...
translation.fr: la seule chose qui marche pour moi...

translation.en: Sometimes the simple things work best.
translation.fr: Parfois, les choses simples sont les meilleures.

translation.en: So are you gonna give me the motivational speech?
translation.fr: Vous allez me faire un discours de motivation ?

translation.en: we've established that's not my strong suit, all right, but...
translation.fr: qu'on a établi que ce n'était pas mon point fort, mais...

translation.en: Go on, get to it. You're burning...
The last race of the night is the KA3 class final.
translation.fr: La dernière course ce soir est la finale de la catégorie KA3.

translation.en: A 20-lapper, at the end of which, we'll have a new national champion.
translation.fr: 20 tours, à la fin desquels on aura un nouveau champion national.

translation.en: Welcome to our television viewers as we go live around Australia.
translation.fr: Bienvenue à nos spectateurs en direct d'Australie.

translation.en: Dean Zeta leads by two kart lengths. He looks like the man to beat tonight.
translation.fr: Dean Zeta a une longueur d'avance. C'est l'homme à battre ce soir.

translation.en: -Come on. -Come on, you've got this, Dean.
Back in the pack and the elbows are out.
Jack Hooper fires one up the inside
A monster lunge by Hooper and he grabs another place!
translation.fr: Hooper déboîte et gagne encore une place !

translation.en: Dean Zeta, showing all of his experience, and he skips away at the front.
translation.fr: Dean Zeta montre toute son expérience et il file devant.

translation.en: Hooper threads the needle through turn three
translation.fr: Hooper coupe l'épingle du virage trois

translation.en: Analyze what the other drivers are doing.
translation.fr: Analyse ce que font les autres.

translation.en: Hooper gets a run and throws one down the inside.
translation.fr: Hooper fonce et dépasse à l'intérieur.

translation.en: Hooper looks the only driver capable of challenging Zeta.
translation.fr: Hooper semble être le seul pilote capable de défier Zeta.

translation.en: Hooper thought about it, but Zeta-- Ooh! Slams the door. There was no way past.
translation.fr: Hooper y a cru, mais Zeta claque la porte. Pas moyen de passer.

translation.en: You have to learn how to control it.
translation.fr: Tu dois apprendre à la contrôler.
Colin Faber. Je ne veux pas rater une aventure.

translation.en: -I don't want to miss out on an adventure. -Two.
translation.fr: Colin Faber. Je ne veux pas rater une aventure. Deux.

translation.en: [announcer] Zeta and Hooper, first and second on the road.
translation.fr: Zeta et Hooper, premier et deuxième sur la route.

translation.en: This is dangerous. There's absolutely no grip out there.
translation.fr: C'est dangereux. Il n'y a aucune adhérence.

translation.en: Hooper cuts up the inside and slingshots out of the final corner!
translation.fr: Hooper passe à l'intérieur et dépasse dans le dernier virage !

translation.en: Jack Hooper is your new national champion.
translation.fr: Jack Hooper est votre nouveau champion national.

translation.en: What a drive. What a mega race.
That was Australian motorsport at its finest.
Dean Zeta finished second. Jack Kagan was third,
translation.fr: Dean Zeta est deuxième. Jack Kagan est troisième,

translation.en: -I couldn't have done it without you. -I know.
translation.fr: - Je n'y serais pas arrivé sans toi. - Je sais.

translation.en: Did you count back from five?
I'm, uh... I'm gonna give Patrick a hand.
[announcer] Ladies and gentlemen, please join us for the presentation ceremony.
translation.fr: Mesdames et messieurs, rejoignez-nous pour la cérémonie de présentation.
